preview: nuc: disable speedtest-tracker until secret exists

nuc: remove speedtest-tracker-env from secrets.nix until .age file exists

agenix auto-creates age.secrets for everything in secrets.nix, so the
missing .age file blocked all secret decryption on deploy.

homepage: fix secret injection via activationScript not ExecStartPre

ExecStartPre runs after EnvironmentFile is loaded, and DynamicUser=true
prevents it reading agenix secrets. Use system.activationScripts instead:
runs as root, after agenix, before any services start.
